mapper.select: SELECT r.request_id, r.title, r.category_tags, r.style, r.amount, r.deadline, r.description, r.image1_url, r.image2_url, r.image3_url, r.username, u.name FROM request r LEFT JOIN user_info u ON r.username = u.username ORDER BY r.request_id

SELECT r.request_id, r.title, r.category_tags, r.style, r.amount, r.deadline, r.description, r.image1_url, r.image2_url, r.image3_url, r.username, u.name FROM request r LEFT JOIN user_info u ON r.username = u.username WHERE r.request_id = #{requestId}
mapper.update: UPDATE request SET title = #{title}, category_tags = #{categoryTags}, style = #{style}, amount = #{amount}, deadline = #{deadline}, description = #{description}, image1_url = #{image1Url}, image2_url = #{image2Url}, image3_url = #{image3Url} WHERE request_id = #{requestId}
